headline: Ask HN: How does more RAM and CPU increase website performance?
description:
Hi all,

when typing this question in Google, the responses are quite diluted, with many results focusing on the RAM of a personal computer rather than that of a hosting provider.

I'm sure many of you here are good at SysOps and can answer this question better.

My website runs WordPress. I get around 30,000 visitors to my website monthly. I am curious on the technical parts of how adding more RAM/CPU is going to increase the performance of my website. At the moment, even when I have 50+ visitors on at the same time, my CPU usage doesn't go very high, and neither does the disk.

So, if I were to upgrade - is it going to be something that I can literally notice the moment I do it?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 更多的内存和CPU如何提高网站性能？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 更多的內存和CPU如何提高網站性能？
description_zh-Hans:
大家好，

当在Google上输入这个问题时，回答相当稀疏，许多结果都集中在个人电脑的内存上，而不是主机提供商的内存上。

我相信这里的许多人都擅长SysOps，可以更好地回答这个问题。

我的网站运行WordPress。我的网站每月有大约30,000名访客。我对增加更多的内存/CPU是如何提高我网站的性能的技术部分感到好奇。目前，即使我有50多个访问者同时在线，我的CPU使用率也不会很高，磁盘也是如此。

因此，如果我要升级--它是否会成为我在做的那一刻就能真正注意到的东西？
description_zh-Hant:

我相信這裡的許多人都擅長SysOps，可以更好地回答這個問題。

我的網站運行WordPress。我的網站每月有大約30,000名訪客。我對增加更多的內存/CPU是如何提高我網站的性能的技術部分感到好奇。目前，即使我有50多個訪問者同時在線，我的CPU使用率也不會很高，磁盤也是如此。
